Name: Landmarks, The Beacon, Manhattan (C 240386 ZMM)
Title: Application number C 240386 ZMM (The Beacon) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 6b: changing from an R7-2 District to an R8 District and changing from an R7X District to an R8 District, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 11, Council District 8.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
